Jodi Balfour (a mụrụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 24, n'afọ 1987) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, nke a maara maka ọrụ ya dịka Gladys Witham na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Canada Bomb Girls na Apple TV + space drama series For All Mankind
Balfour tolitere na Cape Town, South Africa
Ọ bụbu onye so achikọba youth television series Bling nke South Africa na mmalite afọ ndi 2000
O mechara gụọ maka ejije na University of Cape Town  ma gụsịa na Miss South Africa 2008 pageant.
Kemgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2009, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Britain na Canada.

A họpụtara ya dịka Gladys Witham na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn nke Canada Bomb Girls n'afọ 2013. O ritere ihe nrite Canadian Screen Award for Best Lead Actress in a Television Film or Miniseries na 3rd Canadian Screen Awards n'afọ 2015 maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri telivishọn na-esote Bomb Girls: Facing the Enemy
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2015, a họpụtara ya na usoro Cinemax Quarry Kemgbe afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na Apple TV + space drama series For All Mankind
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022, a họpụtara ya na Apple TV + bọl sitcom Ted Lasso
Balfour bi na Vancouver, British Columbia, ebe na mgbakwunye na ime ihe nkiri ya, ọ bụ onye nwe ụlọ kọfị na mpaghara Gastown nke obodo ahụ.

Na 30 June 2021, ọ kwupụtara na Instagram na ọ na-akọwa dịka onye na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị, na-ekwu na ọ hụrụ na ọ na-enwere onwe ya "n'ikpeazụ ịnabata ma chọpụta [ya] queerness". Na 24 Ọktoba 2021, Balfour kwupụtara na Instagram na ya na Abbi Jacobson nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya.
